input_args.passage: 'Anthony Doerr | Anthony Doerr (born October 27, 1973) is an American author of novels and short stories. He gained widespread recognition for his 2014 novel All the Light ...'
input_args.claim: 'First, according to, Anthony Doerr was born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio, and is known as an author, having written story collections including The Shell Collector and Memory Wall, as well as a memoir titled Four Seasons.'
